alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTY THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brookville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brookville, Reynoldsville, Brockway, Falls Creek, and Knox-Dale. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 74 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for west central Pennsylvania.
